General.Name: Huali Industries
General.Description: Dongguan Huali Industries Co.,Ltd researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells decorative composite materials in China and internationally. It offers trim strips, including PVC, ABS, HM, and special-shaped trim strips, etc. used for edge sealing protection and decoration of panel furniture; and veneer, which includes oriented strand board and particleboard as the base material for use in panel furniture production and interior decoration. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Dongguan, China.
